definition: This phrase is commonly used to convey that a certain action or situation will not be of any benefit or advantage to someone. It is often employed to express skepticism or doubt about the effectiveness or usefulness of a particular course of action.

examples.english: That will be of no use to you.
It will be of no use to you.
That will be of no use to you.
It will be of no use to you.
That will be of no use to us.
